thread.title: Kickoff set for Arkansas-Ole Miss game on Nov. 7
thread.title_full: Kickoff set for Arkansas-Ole Miss game on Nov. 7

title: Kickoff set for Arkansas-Ole Miss game on Nov. 7
text:
Facebook Email Twitter Google+ LinkedIn Pinterest Kickoff set for Arkansas-Ole Miss game on Nov. 7 Kickoff time and broadcast information are set for the Arkansas at Ole Miss football game on Nov. 7. Post to Facebook Kickoff set for Arkansas-Ole Miss game on Nov. 7 Kickoff time and broadcast information are set for the Arkansas at Ole Miss football game on Nov. 7.  //on.kthv.com/1S6QQvw   Join the Conversation To   Kickoff set for Arkansas-Ole Miss game on Nov. 7 Associated Press, news source 3:17 p.m. CDT October 26, 2015 Razorback Brandon Allen CONNECT TWEET LINKEDIN COMMENT EMAIL MORE 
FAYETTEVILLE, Ark. (AP) - Kickoff time and broadcast information are set for the Arkansas at Ole Miss football game on Nov. 7. 
Arkansas officials announced Monday that the game in Oxford, Mississippi, will start at 2:30 p.m. and be broadcast on CBS. 
The Razorbacks have won three of the last five games against Ole Miss and hold a 33-27-1 all-time record against the Rebels.
